title: Team Builder Queue is Broken...
body:
So I queued up as a jungler and found a group that needs a support. We waited for 15mins before I decided to go as a support as it would be easier to find a jungler. The slot that was open was bottom lane, any role, so I went as a bottom lane/tank and hoping that I would join the same lobby soon. 15mins later I was still at queue and the leader of the previous team added me and ask if I was still on queue...

So me and my mates tried to replicate the same scenario, they need a jungler and I queued up, we both ended up waiting for 15mins before giving up.

Long story short, the freaking queue system doesn't work or it just takes a very long time to find and match people properly.

replies.body:
Dunno how you got that I get the roles I want in TB under a minute most of the times

There's a supply and demand factor, when you are at TB screen it will tell you which roles are needed more, it's better for player that's versatile in roles. I play all roles, less often at top since there's not much to do except farm, outfarm someone, or get outfarmed
You realise TB matchmaking works differently depending which position/role/champ you pick, right?
